channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: IGN Editor's Choice: The 9 and Above Club
item.description: Amazing games and Masterpieces, awarded by IGN
item.content:encoded:
Looking for something certifiably awesome to play? All of the games in this bundle have scored a rating of 9 (Amazing) or 10 (Masterpiece) from IGN, earning them a prestigious Editors' Choice award—and a spot on your must-play list. In this bundle supporting Extra Life and Girls Who Code, you’ll get:
  • Disco Elysium - The Final Cut
  • Wildermyth
  • Chivalry 2
  • Spiritfarer
  • The Forgotten City
  • GRIME
  • Paradise Killer
Read why IGN critics deemed each game worthy of an Editors' Choice award over at Humble’s sister site IGN.com.

item.title: Living in a Simulation
item.content:encoded: Escape into the cozy embrace of the mundane with this bundle of simulation games that capture the strangely satisfying routines of everyday occupations. Live out your renovation fantasies, whether they involve delicate, tasteful remodels, or rough and ready demolitions in House Flipper plus the Luxury and Garden DLC. Build your agrarian empire by growing crops, raising livestock, and harnessing cutting-edge farm tech in Farming Simulator 19. Live another life in Firefighting Simulator: The Squad, Juno: New Origins, and more, and help support Active Minds with your purchase!
